title: How to Make Toddler Fruit Paste

steps.headline: Blend until a paste with small lumps.
Pull the storks off of your strawberries.
Add to the blender with the sugar.
Blend for 5 - 8 seconds until mildly blended.
Pour in half of the orange juice.
Blend for a couple of seconds.
Add the rest of the juice.
Stir, until thoroughly mixed and a light orangey pink.
Keep in the fridge, and eat within two weeks.

text: Peel and core your apples.  Peel your bananas.  Place all into your blender.  Blend until a paste with small lumps.  Pull the storks off of your strawberries.  Add to the blender with the sugar.  Blend for 5 - 8 seconds until mildly blended.  Pour in half of the orange juice.  Blend for a couple of seconds.  Remove from the blender.  Place in a bowl.  Add the rest of the juice.  Stir, until thoroughly mixed and a light orangey pink.  Place in your jar.  Keep in the fridge, and eat within two weeks.
